website_summaries.verdict: Apply this professional salon curling cream to wet hair to enhance, hydrate, and define your curls.
pros: High-performance formula was designed for hairdressers
Applies the right amount of hold
cons: It can make hair a little crunchy if you use too much

customer_reviews.title: 2 thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I've tried various curl cremes over the years and no real love with any products. My salon introduced me to this one. It does not weigh your hair down or make it stiff and only about a dime size is needed.It helps to add definition to your curls when your hair is wet. It is not cheap but no salon products are. This is my second purchase, so far I'm happy with how it works and I'm sticking with it. I recommend trying it.
customer_reviews.author: Aalba86

customer_reviews.title: Best curls ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is a creamy in texture, only takes about a nickel size dolup first shoulder length hair and the curls come out amazing. No frizzing, stickiness or weighted down hair. I love this product to and got it on Amazon for 1/2 as much as it cost me at the salon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can be sticky if too much is used.
customer_reviews.text: Smells good like watermelon candy. Be careful not to put too much in your hair because it made my hair sticky and difficult to comb (though there was no frizz and my waves were defined). Applying less did nothing for my hair and my hair was left puffy and frizzy.
customer_reviews.author: Mokelel

customer_reviews.title: LUV the curling cream!
customer_reviews.text: Great Curling Cream! In the past I only used Mouse....not any more! The curling cream is light & does not weigh my hair down! LUV IT!
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: This is simply the only hair product I use. ...
customer_reviews.text: This is simply the only hair product I use. Have been using this same product for about 3 years now.
customer_reviews.author: SwtTxnGrl

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Not sticky and I love that I ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Not sticky and I love that I can wash an go and my curls will stay. Spent a fortune on other products that do not work. I use about a quarter size of product for thick shoulder length hair but play with the quantity that will work for you. Will be purchasing this again soon.
customer_reviews.author: LM Hamlin

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stuff! I have thick wavy hair and I can put this product in damp hair for better control and curl. It gives it just the right amount of texture and doesn't look wet or stiff. I have found I can go to bed with damp hair and just add more moisture and "boing" and it makes my hair manageable. Yeah!
customer_reviews.author: colleen smith

customer_reviews.title: Love this curling cream
customer_reviews.text: Love this curling cream. I have short curly hair that can become CRAZY in the humid enviroment where I live. Just the right amount of taming while allowing my curls to, well, curl!
customer_reviews.author: Kimmie58

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. Flattened my hair
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Flattened my hair. I don't understand why, though. My hairstylist used this on me in the salon and my hair looked great! After purchasing from Amazon, I used it in the exact same way she did and my hair looked terrible. Won't buy again. Now I have to throw it out because what else am I going to do with it?
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Fine Hair
customer_reviews.text: I don't buy this for curls. I get it because it gives my fine hair some volume....just don't use too much or it will make your hair stiff and look dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Caron J. Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Boingtastic!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a product that allows natural curls to look kept, without the weird crunchy wet look.
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best curling cream I have used in a long time. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jana Haines

customer_reviews.title: I love BOING Curling Cream
customer_reviews.text: I love BOING Curling Cream. The consistency is perfect for my hair. I scrunch my hair, and this product holds my curls in place without ever making me hair feel sticky or look stiff. I have been using this product for years, and I love as much today as I did when I first tried it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this for adding a little curl
customer_reviews.text: I love this cream for my wavy/curly hair. Have relied on this for years now.
customer_reviews.author: Adilys

customer_reviews.title: There is hope for fine hair
customer_reviews.text: I have fine, thin hair that never holds a curl... until now. Great product! Only used a small amount and I was very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: This hair cream is the best product I've ever tried and I have tried A ...
customer_reviews.text: This hair cream is the best product I've ever tried and I have tried A LOT. It gives my curls a lot of spring but isn't crunchy. My hair is frizz free and soft to the touch. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen H.

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is fantastic. Never feels like it’s there, but calms and reinforces curls. Makes fuzzy hair into nice curls
customer_reviews.author: HFS

customer_reviews.title: Great product but word of caution you ONLY NEED A ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product but word of caution you ONLY NEED A VERY SMALL AMOUNT. Can get very greasy if too much.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Bombard

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for a few years and I love it. I have curly hair and it isn't easy to find a product that doesn't feel too heavy in your hair, but enhances or defines the curl.
customer_reviews.author: R Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Hard hold sticky the next day really sticky. You ...
customer_reviews.text: Hard hold sticky the next day really sticky. You might as buy a drug store brand and safe yourself some money.
customer_reviews.author: Miso

customer_reviews.title: This is def worth it
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and helps curls stay all day but doesn’t make the curls rock hard Smells like watermelon too
customer_reviews.author: Valentina

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed at all didn't do much for my hair weighed it down
customer_reviews.author: mbprenee

customer_reviews.title: fine hair with only a tiny bit of wave
customer_reviews.text: I have fairly short, fine hair with only a tiny bit of wave. This product gives me a "messy curl" look by simply applying it to my towel-dried hair and scrunching with my hands. It is very easy to use and severals of my friends are considering using it too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Curl Encouragement!
customer_reviews.text: A very small amount of this product gives perfect volume and curl. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Redheadsrule

customer_reviews.title: I love this curling cream and have been using it for ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this curling cream and have been using it for 5 years now. a bit pricey but honestly you only need to apply a very little bit of it so it lasts for a really long time (and I have long hair and load of it!)
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: it works fine but i am not to fond of the smell, i get headaches quite often with strong scents and this is one that i do not like, i though it would smell like the shampoo , for the price i can buy a least expensive product that will work fine and smell better
customer_reviews.author: Marisol

customer_reviews.title: Curly hair pro
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It was recommended to me to seperate my hair in three layers and not over do the gel. It smells great and it holds my curls better than any other product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft curls and style
customer_reviews.text: Just like you can buy at the salon and puts moisture back in my curly hair.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Williams

customer_reviews.title: Third bottle I've bought and still loving it.
customer_reviews.text: This product does a great job with my naturally curly hair. It keeps it from fizzing, makes the curled distinct and doesn't make my hair crunchy.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Muth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff .. keep in mind it adds texture as well!!! My curls are delicious !!
customer_reviews.author: Midnight snack

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my hair on curly days, and I love the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great Curl
customer_reviews.text: I have thin, fine, curly hair and everything makes my hair get weighed down. This product gives me a defined ,nice curl. Your hair will be a little crispy when it dries but just fluff it out and you will be happy with the results!
customer_reviews.author: Fabmom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for curly hair
customer_reviews.text: Makes my hair feel soft while still holding curl, doesn't weigh it down and smells great!! Most Definitely would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Brittany R Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for naturally curly hair. Have used this for over 12 years and I still love it!
customer_reviews.author: AmaJen0607

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have natural curly, somewhat loose curls. This dried my hair out and I didn't see any curl definition
customer_reviews.author: Melissa E. Orr

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: The best "keep it curly" product I've ever used. I'd be lost without it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and I am I love with this one
customer_reviews.text: Have tried so many curl products, and I am I love with this one! I can count on this product to produce a good hair day!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna C.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I have fine curly hair that tends toward frizz I have tried multiple products on my hair including Devo Curl , Ouidad, and Living proof None work as well as Boing my only complaint is that it is so hard to find!
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: love love love
customer_reviews.text: love love love! this is my third bottle, and I have a backup in the closet. My hair is frizzy without product, but I live in FLORIDA the HUMIDITY capital of the world. This product gives me curl, definition and volume. Smell does not bother me at all
customer_reviews.author: Debra M.

customer_reviews.title: BOING CURLING CREAM by UNITED
customer_reviews.text: GREAT PRODUCT! Smells like cotton candy! LOVE ❤️ THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Morris-Self

customer_reviews.title: Shipping and service was excellent, though
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived as expected, but I didn't really care for the product. Shipping and service was excellent, though.
customer_reviews.author: William F. Boetcher

customer_reviews.title: I've use this one time and my hair looks completely ...
customer_reviews.text: I've use this one time and my hair looks completely different. I have very curly unruly hair the stuff is a game changer.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: curls
customer_reviews.text: i use this product for a couple of years already. After searching for a good curl product for years, i found what i was looking for. Your hair is still soft after using it, and your curls look great
customer_reviews.author: lhj wagemans

customer_reviews.title: Sis loves it
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my sis. She loves this stuff and it smells nice. She said the bottle is ginormous and that I got a good deal on it
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Leaves my hair too thick and crispy although it claims it won't
customer_reviews.author: Nursedana

customer_reviews.title: Boing
customer_reviews.text: Unite “Boing” curling cream is the best I have found ! I have curly hair but it is coarse and somewhat frizzy; Boing calms my hair and allows better management.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great product.
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with this product. I got a perm and it keeps my curls in control.
customer_reviews.author: 1111gailb

customer_reviews.title: it would be a great product.
customer_reviews.text: It was too heavy for my hair and it felt crunchy. I'm sure for someone with thicker hair, it would be a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Piggott

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Made my hair dry and did not help it hold a curl at all. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: CST

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff, keeps hair from frizzing and maintains curls
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for curly or course hair in summer humidity
customer_reviews.text: Great for curly or course hair in summer humidity! You don't need much, I put a small amount into wet hair. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa L

customer_reviews.title: Thinkens hair
customer_reviews.text: I don't use it for curls. It helps THICKEN my hair. Love it. I you have thin/ fine hair give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Lindborg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is stiff though - you must use a moisturizing cream first.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen T.

customer_reviews.title: Great for curly hair!
customer_reviews.text: This products really works for curly hair! I love the smell and the way it defines my curls.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Keller

customer_reviews.title: Volumizes fine hair for blow drying.
customer_reviews.text: I have fine hair and use this to give body to my blown-dry hair without feeling sticky or heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie M.

customer_reviews.title: A++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
customer_reviews.text: would recommend to curly hair clients cause i do hair:-) product was sent on time and will use again when i need a product fast!!!!
customer_reviews.author: FURST -

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Boing is a wonderful product. Keros curls soft and natural.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing for curly hair, smells nice too. A little goes a long way. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for a Curly Girlie!
customer_reviews.text: This product was first recommended to me by my stylist for my curly hair and I have continued to buy/use it since. It gives the perfect amount of control and hold to my frizzy curly hair...not to mention it smells amazing!
customer_reviews.author: McCoachGal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best hair product for my curls! Soft and structured to prevent frizz. Love it, love it, love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: EMKhanwilkar

customer_reviews.title: going BOING
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for several years, and works wonderful with my hair. Does not make your hair stiff - you know the feel of straw. My hair stylist introduced me to this product and I have used it from that point on.
customer_reviews.author: Quila Crowe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Been using for years. Only curling product that works to bring out my curls
customer_reviews.author: Meggan Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for controlling curly hair!
customer_reviews.text: It performs well but my hair dresser gets better results. I guess thats why I pay her she gets great results.
customer_reviews.author: experienced shopper

customer_reviews.title: I have very fine curly hair that's not very thick and has some ...
customer_reviews.text: This weighed my hair down way too much and made it look clumpy. I have very fine curly hair that's not very thick and has some frizz.
customer_reviews.author: Rana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Adds body/curl to already wavy hair without weighing it down.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the best product for curly hair I have found yet...and the smell is pretty spectacular
customer_reviews.author: Erin Cutri

customer_reviews.title: Nice stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff, I have wavy hair this makes it curly can't be without it, not all sticky like some
customer_reviews.author: K9saver

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love Unite Boing cream. Doesn't make my hair heavy. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Rude

customer_reviews.title: What I love about it is I can put it in my ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the only product I found that holds curls in my hair. What I love about it is I can put it in my hair and let it air dry for a beach look or I can curl it and it will stay for 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product and great price
customer_reviews.text: Great for hair that is on the straighter side. I can actually get some curl out of my hair without a curling iron!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Ballinger

customer_reviews.title: Nice product!
customer_reviews.text: Boing curling cream does a great job holding curls together and keeping hair soft, but I still need a light gel on top to hold down the frizzies.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Barina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff It smells so good!! It enhances my curls, keeps my hair curly all day!
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Not that good.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product hoping it would help my hair keep a curl, but, it doesn't and after usng it your Hair feels like it needs to be washed again. I would not recommend this product .
customer_reviews.author: Rita Hall

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this cream after I saw it recommended on a YouTube video about fine
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cream after I saw it recommended on a YouTube video about fine, curly hair. Overall, I really like the product, it defines my curls without weighing them down, smells amazing and it not greasy or heavy at all. The only reason this didn't get a five-star review is because I don't like the way it makes my curls feel. While they look great, they feel tacky rather than soft. Having curly hair, I don't typically touch it throughout the day for fear of making it frizzy but this made me not want to touch it because I didn't like the way it felt. If you're okay with that, I'd recommend you try it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiana Jovana

customer_reviews.title: Helps give curl/body to fine straight hari
customer_reviews.text: I have super fine straight hair and have tried many products to try to get curl / body. I used this product on damp hair; then rolled it over night. It has performed better than the average product in keeping the curl. I like that it only takes a small amount so it will last a long time. The curls fall over time but I felt they held longer than with other products I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lynn

customer_reviews.title: My go-to product to manage my hair
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Helps hold nice curls, no frizz. Smells good;not overpowering like some.
customer_reviews.author: J Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with this product !
customer_reviews.text: I used a quarter sized amount on damp hair, ended up with Texas sized hair going everywhere. The problem with this product is that it is definitely not for long baby-fine hair like mine. Lost too much hair trying to comb it out even with a wide tooth comb. Now I use a smaller amount (dime sized) just on the ends.
customer_reviews.author: sandy spranger

customer_reviews.title: May not be for everyone
customer_reviews.text: I have thick, long wavy to curly hair, which can be unruly when left to it's own devices. I use a leave in conditioner, and a dallop, about the size of a quarter, to encourage cooperation. The cream tends to be a bit heavy, and can feel tacky, if you don't wash off the remnants, but it's just what my 2b curls need to calm down and maintain a decent style.
customer_reviews.author: Aussie Mom

customer_reviews.title: Keep the curls you have all day
customer_reviews.text: Good product to keep your curls all day in spite of a breeze. Strong wind, eh? Probably not, but a breeze won't have your wavy curls going frizz crazy on you.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hair that is wavy that you want to ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for hair that is wavy that you want to be curly. It only takes a small amount to work well.
customer_reviews.author: SuzieQSolarama

customer_reviews.title: Never looked back!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE Boing Curling cream! I discovered this product a few years ago from my hair dresser! I have always had issues with my curly hair- too frizzy, too straggly, to crunchy and hard looking with products, the list goes on. Until I found Boing and have never looked back. It holds and accentuates my natural curls all day long without leaving my hair crunchy or hard. I recommend this product to anyone who is tired of curly hair problems! :)
customer_reviews.author: S Lep

customer_reviews.title: This is the best stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only hair product that curls my hair and has hold to it and is not crunchy. This is the best stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Kidd

customer_reviews.title: No changes with Wavy Hair
customer_reviews.text: Of all the Unite products this one has been my least favorite so far. It hasn't done anything for my wavy hair. Maybe my hair isn't curly enough? Overall, if you have wavy hair I wouldn't recommend using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny J

customer_reviews.title: It does an excellent job defining my curls
customer_reviews.text: It does an excellent job defining my curls. The length of your hair determines the amount used to achieve the look you want. Start with less, until you find the correct amount for your look. My hair stylist recommended this product and I used for about two years. Stopped carrying it at the salon and I used another product. I finally went searching for it on line and found it through Amazon Prime. Yeah!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Unites Boing for years and absolutely LOVE it! I recommend their hair care line to everyone I can.
customer_reviews.author: MooseyLee

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like this hair product. I makes my curls hold and is light too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: My hair is wavy swavy and this curling cream works just great. big soft loose curls that last all day.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lorenz

customer_reviews.title: It smells amazing!! Although
customer_reviews.text: This product is "ok". It smells amazing!! Although, I am disappointed that it came with tape all over it. I know it was to protect it from busting while in shipment however it has left the tape "sticky" all over it! Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Does not do what it says it does.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product after hearing many good reviews about how it curled hair. It does not curl hair at all! It left my hair crunchy and sticky but still straight. You would be better off buying mousse, this stuff is a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: My hairdresser gave me a sample of this stuff, and I loved it. It really emphasizes the natural curl in my hair, and keeps the curls going for the whole day. And it smells good, and it's not too sticky. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Melyssa Fratkin

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I basically have straight hair with a slight bend if I don't blowdry - BUT when I use this it gives me nice beachy waves and helps minimize showing how my hair is layered. It makes my hair soft, but gives it body also. You get a lot for your money and you don't need to use a lot of this. A great product! I would buy more when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Didn't see a Difference
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended by a professional stylist but I personally saw no difference in the way my hair kept curl. I tried using a little and then I tried using alot. I tried it on both rainy and dry days. No luck - I just threw away the rest. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Shoe Belle

customer_reviews.title: Holds my curls
customer_reviews.text: I really like Unite hair products and wanted to try the curling cream , I use hot rollers and now my curls last longer and gives my hair more fullness I will continue to use this product .
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Dunbar

customer_reviews.title: Soft, tame curls
customer_reviews.text: My stylist recommended this product to me, and I'm so glad she did. I've tried quite a few products over the years, and this is the best one I've found to keep my curls soft and bouncy. It also cuts down on the frizz. A little bit of this goes a long way! I have shoulder-length, medium-curly hair, and I add a fingernail-size blob to my damp hair and let it dry naturally. If you use too much your hair can get a little crispy in places, but you can just scrunch it out.
customer_reviews.author: sodgers

customer_reviews.title: My hair won't curl at all, so when I ...
customer_reviews.text: My hair won't curl at all, so when I bought this I had low expectations but it seems to keep the curls in!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryln

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical after reading reviews on this product. It is technically for women with curly hair but I read it can also be used for curling straight hair. It does work and actually held a curl in my hair for 2 days! It's not greasy, has a nice, light scent.
customer_reviews.author: Diva_Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This works very well on either dry or wet hair. I towel dry my hair, squeeze out about a quarter size amount and rub it in. It holds curls very well even if I run my fingers through it when it's dry.
customer_reviews.author: Lori L.

customer_reviews.title: I really like! You dont need a lot either and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I have curly hair, the kind where you either got to straighten it or put in product to keep from frizzing...so I was hesitant to try this due to trying a lot products and them failing. I have to say, this stuff really works. I add a little bit of hairspray to keep it all day. I really like! You dont need a lot either and I have very long hair!
customer_reviews.author: Monae

customer_reviews.title: unite is great!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several unite products, and they all deliver great hair! The boing curling cream is a perfect example--a little cream while hair is still damp--"scrunch" the hair, and you get salon quality soft curls!
customer_reviews.author: stellar shopper

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: FAVORITE hair prodcut for curly hair! Started using it years ago when recommended by my salon, then no one in my local area carried it any longer. SO GLAD to have found it on your site! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Anne

product_meta.title: UNITE Hair Boing Curling Cream by Unite for Unisex Cream, 8 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
No sulfates, parabens or sodium chloride added

BRAND STORY
UNITE is a Professional Salon Hair Care System developed by a hairdresser for hairdressers, with over 40 high-quality, high-performance formulas top salon and editorial stylists demand for their craft, and for their clients.
